title: English Tongue Twisters
description: How well do you know the classic and clever tongue twisters of the English language? Test your knowledge of these tricky phrases!

questions.question: Complete this classic tongue twister: 'She sells _____ by the seashore.'
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck, according to the tongue twister?
options: As much wood as a woodchuck could chuck

questions.question: In the tongue twister about Peter Piper, what did Peter Piper pick?
What makes a phrase qualify as a tongue twister?
options: It uses similar sounds that are hard to say quickly

questions.question: Complete this tongue twister: 'Red lorry, _____ lorry.'
The tongue twister 'She sells seashells' is said to be inspired by which real person?
Which of these is considered one of the hardest tongue twisters according to MIT researchers?
options: Toy boat, toy boat, toy boat
Pad kid poured curd pulled cod

questions.question: Complete the tongue twister: 'Betty Botter bought some _____.'
What was wrong with the butter that Betty Botter bought?
Which type of sound combination typically makes tongue twisters most difficult?
options: Similar but slightly different consonant sounds

questions.question: Complete: 'The sixth sick sheikh's sixth sheep's _____.'
'The sixth sick sheikh's sixth sheep's sick' is listed in which record book as the hardest tongue twister?
Complete this tongue twister: 'I scream, you scream, we all scream for _____.'
Which of these words is itself a tongue twister when repeated quickly?
Tongue twisters are used professionally by which group of people as warm-up exercises?
